title: I am confused about what to choose between Pharm.D and biomedical science. I found both interesting, but which has a better career? - Quora

response.answer_text: Try to analyzing you social need with reference to economics or market oriented, observe biomedical carries is good but medical profession in India totally dominate by doctor but In case of pharm d it is much better than biomedical because it is money oriented and ecosystem of pharmacological is very good in India.
